程序包的使用
org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool

  • 使用org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool  
    org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.interceptor  
    org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.jmx  
  • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool使用的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的类 
    类和说明
    ConnectionPool
    Implementation of simple connection pool.
    DataSource
    A DataSource that can be instantiated through IoC and implements the DataSource interface since the DataSourceProxy is used as a generic proxy.
    DataSourceProxy
    The DataSource proxy lets us implements methods that don't exist in the current compiler JDK but might be methods that are part of a future JDK DataSource interface.
    FairBlockingQueue.ExchangeCountDownLatch 
    JdbcInterceptor
    Abstract class that is to be extended for implementations of interceptors.
    MultiLockFairBlockingQueue.ExchangeCountDownLatch 
    PoolConfiguration
    A list of properties that are configurable for a connection pool.
    PooledConnection
    Represents a pooled connection and holds a reference to the Connection object
    PooledConnectionMBean 
    PoolProperties.InterceptorDefinition 
    PoolProperties.InterceptorProperty 
    Validator
    Interface to be implemented by custom validator classes.
  • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.interceptor使用的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的类 
    类和说明
    ConnectionPool
    Implementation of simple connection pool.
    JdbcInterceptor
    Abstract class that is to be extended for implementations of interceptors.
    PooledConnection
    Represents a pooled connection and holds a reference to the Connection object
    PoolProperties.InterceptorProperty 
  • org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool.jmx使用的org.apache.tomcat.jdbc.pool中的类 
    类和说明
    ConnectionPool
    Implementation of simple connection pool.
    PoolConfiguration
    A list of properties that are configurable for a connection pool.
    PoolProperties.InterceptorDefinition 
    Validator
    Interface to be implemented by custom validator classes.
